text: Congratulations to my colleagues @EnvAgency who have been recognised for their services to #FloodRisk, groundwater, environment and for raising awareness of #ProstateCancer - proud to be a colleague of you all https://t.co/a80DAkOvRG

The breach in the bank of #SherborneBrook now flowing unabated for a year,forming a new deep channel, scouring pasture of topsoil and felling trees in its path. Weir blocked with debris. This is Grade2 Historic landscape being damaged daily for a year. what to do? @EnvAgency https://t.co/J8gce8n6wf
It is not OK for @EnvAgency staff to own shares in the industry they are meant to be regulating. Why do you permit it @JamesBevanEA @EmmaHowardBoyd ?  And have you got any? https://t.co/67Tjps9Zyz
